languages.text: {n}Абеляр досадливо качает головой.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, давайте вам на корабле тир устроим? С живыми хищниками в качестве мишеней? С миниатюрным лесом? Будете выезжать на охоту, тешить удаль. Вот это — подходящий досуг для благородных господ. А такие "шутки" как это — позор для рода, право слово".

{n}Abelard shakes his head in annoyance.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, would you like me to set up a shooting gallery on the ship? With live predators as targets? Set in a miniature forest? You can go hunting, satisfy your daring that way. That would be a suitable entertainment for a noble {mf|lord|lady}. But 'pranks' like this one are a disgrace to Humanity, plain and simple."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр досадливо качает головой.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, давайте вам на корабле тир устроим? С живыми хищниками в качестве мишеней? С миниатюрным лесом? Будете выезжать на охоту, тешить удаль. Вот это — подходящий досуг для благородных господ. А такие "шутки" как это — позор для рода, право слово".

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德恼怒地摇起了头。{/n}“{mf|大人|大人}，您希望我在飞船上建造一座靶场吗？我可以建造一座微型森林，里面放满活生生的掠食者当靶子，您觉得怎么样？您可以随时去打猎，以这种方式来锻炼您的胆识，这会是很适合贵族{mf|老爷|女士}的娱乐活动。然而像这样的‘恶作剧’，简直是在给整个人类丢脸，就是这样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head in annoyance.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, would you like me to set up a shooting gallery on the ship? With live predators as targets? Set in a miniature forest? You can go hunting, satisfy your daring that way. That would be a suitable entertainment for a noble {mf|lord|lady}. But 'pranks' like this one are a disgrace to Humanity, plain and simple."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德恼怒地摇起了头。{/n}“{mf|大人|大人}，您希望我在飞船上建造一座靶场吗？我可以建造一座微型森林，里面放满活生生的掠食者当靶子，您觉得怎么样？您可以随时去打猎，以这种方式来锻炼您的胆识，这会是很适合贵族{mf|老爷|女士}的娱乐活动。然而像这样的‘恶作剧’，简直是在给整个人类丢脸，就是这样。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard niega con la cabeza, molesto.{/n} «Mil{mf|ord|ady}, ¿le gustaría que organizara una galería de tiro en la nave? Podríamos usar depredadores vivos como dianas y ambientarlo en un bosque en miniatura. Podría ir de caza y satisfacer así sus ganas de aventura. Eso sería un pasatiempo digno de un{mf||a} noble. Pero esta clase de "bromas" son una vergüenza para la Humanidad, es así de sencillo».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head in annoyance.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, would you like me to set up a shooting gallery on the ship? With live predators as targets? Set in a miniature forest? You can go hunting, satisfy your daring that way. That would be a suitable entertainment for a noble {mf|lord|lady}. But 'pranks' like this one are a disgrace to Humanity, plain and simple."

Podríamos usar depredadores vivos como dianas y ambientarlo en un bosque en miniatura. Podría ir de caza y satisfacer así sus ganas de aventura. Eso sería un pasatiempo digno de un{mf||a} noble. Pero esta clase de "bromas" son una vergüenza para la Humanidad, es así de sencillo».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはイライラと頭を振る。{/n}「陛下、船に射撃場を設置してはいかがでしょうか？生きたプレデターを標的にどうです？ミニチュアの森をしつらえて？狩りにでも行けば、陛下の豪傑さを満足させられましょう。高貴なるお方にふさわしい娯楽に違いありません。しかし、このような『いたずら』は、単純明快、人類の恥です」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head in annoyance.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, would you like me to set up a shooting gallery on the ship? With live predators as targets? Set in a miniature forest? You can go hunting, satisfy your daring that way. That would be a suitable entertainment for a noble {mf|lord|lady}. But 'pranks' like this one are a disgrace to Humanity, plain and simple."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはイライラと頭を振る。{/n}「陛下、船に射撃場を設置してはいかがでしょうか？生きたプレデターを標的にどうです？ミニチュアの森をしつらえて？狩りにでも行けば、陛下の豪傑さを満足させられましょう。高貴なるお方にふさわしい娯楽に違いありません。しかし、このような『いたずら』は、単純明快、人類の恥です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, soll ich etwa eine Schießanlage auf dem Schiff installieren? Mit lebenden Raubtieren als Ziele? In einem Miniaturwald? Dann könnt Ihr dort Euren Jagdinstinkt befriedigen. Das wäre eine geeignete Unterhaltung für {mf|einen adligen Lord|eine adlige Lady}. Aber 'Streiche' wie dieser sind schlicht und ergreifend eine Schande für die Menschheit."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head in annoyance.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, would you like me to set up a shooting gallery on the ship? With live predators as targets? Set in a miniature forest? You can go hunting, satisfy your daring that way. That would be a suitable entertainment for a noble {mf|lord|lady}. But 'pranks' like this one are a disgrace to Humanity, plain and simple."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard schüttelt missbilligend den Kopf.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, soll ich etwa eine Schießanlage auf dem Schiff installieren? Mit lebenden Raubtieren als Ziele? In einem Miniaturwald? Dann könnt Ihr dort Euren Jagdinstinkt befriedigen. Das wäre eine geeignete Unterhaltung für {mf|einen adligen Lord|eine adlige Lady}. Aber 'Streiche' wie dieser sind schlicht und ergreifend eine Schande für die Menschheit."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard secoue la tête d'un air agacé.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, souhaiteriez-vous que je fasse installer un stand de tir sur le vaisseau ? Avec des prédateurs vivants en guise de cibles ? Dans une forêt miniature ? Vous pourriez ainsi satisfaire votre fougue. Et y trouver une manière convenable pour {mf|un noble seigneur|une noble dame} de se divertir. Mais les "farces" comme celle-ci sont une honte pour le genre humain, purement et simplement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head in annoyance.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, would you like me to set up a shooting gallery on the ship? With live predators as targets? Set in a miniature forest? You can go hunting, satisfy your daring that way. That would be a suitable entertainment for a noble {mf|lord|lady}. But 'pranks' like this one are a disgrace to Humanity, plain and simple."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard secoue la tête d'un air agacé.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, souhaiteriez-vous que je fasse installer un stand de tir sur le vaisseau ? Avec des prédateurs vivants en guise de cibles ? Dans une forêt miniature ? Vous pourriez ainsi satisfaire votre fougue. Et y trouver une manière convenable pour {mf|un noble seigneur|une noble dame} de se divertir. Mais les "farces" comme celle-ci sont une honte pour le genre humain, purement et simplement. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Canı sıkılan Abelard, başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, gemide bir atış poligonu kurmamı ister miydiniz? Hedef olarak canlı ve yırtıcı hayvanlar koyabiliriz. Minyatür bir orman yaratırız. Bu şekilde ava çıkıp gözü pekliğinizi tatmin edebilirsiniz. Soylu bir {mf|lorda|leydiye} yaraşır bir eğlence çıkar. Bunun gibi 'eşek şakaları' ise tüm İnsanlığın yüz karasıdır. Bu kadar basit."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard shakes his head in annoyance.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, would you like me to set up a shooting gallery on the ship? With live predators as targets? Set in a miniature forest? You can go hunting, satisfy your daring that way. That would be a suitable entertainment for a noble {mf|lord|lady}. But 'pranks' like this one are a disgrace to Humanity, plain and simple."
